## Design Considerations

Please consider these Antonio Evo principles:

- [ ] Works offline-first (no internet dependency)
- [ ] Code decides, models suggest (no LLM-driven routing)
- [ ] Integrates with audit trail (SHA-256 hash chain)
- [ ] Respects cognitive budget (profile-aware)
- [ ] No silent side effects
